programme.title: Olympic Games Paris 2024: Today in Paris 2024
programme.desc: (Live) Bonjour Paris! Catch top athletes from TeamSG and from around the world on our highlights show Today in Paris 2024.

programme.title: Olympic Games Paris 2024: Daily Action at Paris 2024
programme.desc: The world's biggest sports stars descend on the City of Light, including Singapore's Max Maeder, Shanti Pereira and Loh Kean Yew! Daily Action at Paris 2024 brings you their quest for Olympic glory!

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Celebrity Family Feud
programme.desc: The classic Family Feud format has entertained a generation, and this hilarious celebrity reboot sees Emmy-award winning talk show host Steve Harley at the helm, as your favourite celebrities and their families play the game, thinking on their feet and trying to second guess the general public.

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series S24
programme.desc: It's a big, big world, but you know where to find Ash and Goh---battling and catching Pokemon from Kanto to Galar! With Pikachu, Cinderace, and their other Pokemon beside them, our heroes continue to travel all over the world to research Pokemon for Cerise Laboratory.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Evolution
programme.desc: Valt Aoi, who participated in the Japanese Championship, was scouted for the prestigious Spanish team BC Sol and heads out to Spain. With their sights set on the world, Valt and his friends begin their challenge for the World League!

programme.title: Mighty Express
programme.desc: Catching a ride with the 'Mighty Express', a team of trains and their kid-friends who go on exciting adventures and overcome trouble on the tracks with quick thinking and teamwork.

programme.title: Mighty Express
programme.desc: Catching a ride with the 'Mighty Express', a team of trains and their kid-friends who go on exciting adventures and overcome trouble on the tracks with quick thinking and teamwork.

programme.title: The Adventure Of Little Penguin S1
programme.desc: Follow the hectic and exciting adventures of Oscar the little penguin in unique environments! The young penguin is setting out to explore the world, meeting new characters who teach him about himself, but also about others. He quickly discovers that it's not the destination that matters, but rather the people you meet along the journey.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: An unusual guest shows up in Leo's swimming pool - a dugong! Come along with the Junior Rangers as they seek a safe home for the dugong. But can they accomplish that while warding off a ship of dugong hunters? Leo spots a white-bellied sea eagle while flying his kite. Understanding that the sea eagle doesn't belong in their garden, the Junior Rangers take the sea eagle to a lake where it can find food - and its partner!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53
programme.desc: In this season, Ji-Young, a Korean-American girl muppet joins the main cast!

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Blippi's enthusiastic and expressive character engages children on their level through relatable adventures while sharing their excitement in discovering the world around us. Blippi is so entertaining, engaging and fun, kids don't even realize they're learning!

programme.desc: Change comes to Lil Wild as Susie is promoted to Ranger and Meep gets a glimpse into family life, which brings back memories of his long-lost dad. Meanwhile a dastardly poacher pursues a mysterious beast through the city.

programme.desc: Welcome to Mia's Magic Playground! programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! follows the adventures of high school student Yugi, who has a magical secret that comes to life when he plays his favorite card game.

programme.title: Mechamato 'The Animated Series' S2
programme.desc: Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: DENVER The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Where most kids dream of having a dog, a cat, or even a hamster, Cliff has a dinosaur - Denver! Within adventures revolving around Cliff, Denver and a comedic crew of human friends, there's an inevitable monkey wrench that is always in play - Denver is a dino in a china shop! Moreover, being one-of- a-kind puts Denver on everyone's radar.

programme.title: Sky Shakers Series
programme.desc: Nat gets captured by the Henchman and the spaceship takes off, the children decide to head to Uncle Ong's house to look for him. The children tells Uncle Ong that they suspect SORA is behind this. Uncle Ong denies that possibility. They head over to the site where the spaceship was. Uncle Ong and Andy concluded that the spaceship will not leave Earth and that it will have to find a big landing space to land. Uncle Ong and the Sky Shakers search all around for possible landing sites.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo discovers that a satin bowerbird has been stealing blue objects from him and his family. Realising that the satin bowerbird might be lost, the Junior Rangers set out to bring the satin bowerbird back to its bower. A pygmy hippo appears in the garden pond. The Junior Rangers hit the road to send the hippo home, but their journey is delayed by a sticky situation involving quicksand.

programme.title: Lil Wild S2
programme.desc: When word gets around that a wild animal has broken into the wildlife park, chaos rules as groups of animals take sides and turn against each other. Rara and the gang try to hunt down the monster in their midst. Relegated to playing lookout, Meep decides to search for the animal on his own - but he's not the only one. A poacher is also hot on the animal's trail! Can the Lil Wild team catch the monster before the poacher does?

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A honey bee drops in on Leo's picnic. The Junior Rangers buzz down to the forest to guide the honey bee back to its beehive, but an encounter with some wasps could prove too much for the Junior Rangers to handle. A baby bottlenose dolphin is the last animal Leo expects to see in his garden pond. But when the unexpectable happens, the Junior Rangers start on an expedition to find the dolphin's mother.

programme.desc: (PG) 文欣(白薇秀)小时候有严重的阅读障碍，长大后当上社工，决心帮助不幸的孩童也能健康成长。在工作中，接触到四个不幸患有先天缺陷的孩子，感同身受的她亲眼看到孩子的父母内心的矛盾和不当的照顾方法而耽误了孩子的前途。然而，要让这四个家庭能够从迷失中寻到正路，开展幸福快乐的新生活绝非易事，文欣得披荆斩棘，迎战一个个的障碍。正当文欣为他们的未来心力交瘁之际，自己的恋情却亮起红灯，本来曾经患有阅读障碍的秘密，却成为情敌横刀夺爱的利器。在陷入爱情和事业困境而想放弃一切的时候，男友和一群她曾经帮助过的孩子却出现在她.

programme.title: 养生出大招
programme.desc: 菊花明目人人懂，可是小巧的胎菊、苦涩的黄菊、清香的白菊，到底哪个才是明目大王？养生出大招，医师来拆招，菊花种类功效必须懂，这样才能选对菊花来明目，否则就是吃心酸！医师再破招，吃枸杞也有注意事项，小心体质不适合，吃了明目不成反而满眼血丝！ 喝奶茶可以养生吗？一位医师秘制明目奶茶，炒香一种神秘的中药材，用来泡水竟然散发淡淡咖啡香，还有清肝明目功效，绝对满足现代人时尚养生观！ 奇招还没完，练功师傅来一招左右引臂运火轮，保证练出火眼金睛！拉弓，引臂，按压膻中穴，转体，刺激手部经脉，手掌引领真气到眼睛，所有步骤一气.

programme.title: 云襄传

programme.title: 冀味兒 第二季
programme.desc: (PG)《冀味儿》是首部聚焦燕赵美食的文化纪录片，也是主创团队镜头向下，用平民视角和故事手法聚焦乡野达人，还原美食背后技艺与传承、性格与情感的致敬之作。透过氤氲的美食香气，观众闻得到乡土气息，听得见朴素乡音，窥得着精神气质，品得出淡淡乡愁。乡村、家常、草根、一日三餐。整季地域范围跨度大，重点打造两纵两横美食文化线，滹沱河与燕山横亘东西，太行山并大运河纵横南北，经纬度定位清晰，勾勒出一城一味的燕赵风情。.

programme.title: 云襄传
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 凌渊的人动手，唐笑无声无息死在唐家地窖。而云襄告诉舒亚男，他苦苦寻找的仇家竟与苏家有关，舒雅楠担心云襄找苏鸣玉寻仇，但云襄此时心急着救莫爷。与此同时，一个黑衣女子将舒亚男带去见昨日的神秘人，此人名为寇元杰，是凌渊少主，而舒亚男真实身份是凌渊大小姐，真名为寇莲衣。寇元杰质问寇莲衣，离家三年说要寻找制衡南宫放的良策，如今却和云台的云襄勾搭在一起，寇莲衣称南宫放虽为凌渊的人，但行事手段和云台何其相似，因此她留在云襄身边，想学到手段日后制衡南宫放。.

programme.title: 大英雄
